page.title: 19NORRIS GREEN(LIVERPOOL)VIEWS
page.content: A WHILE AGO WE DID A SURVEY TO SEE HOW LONG PEOPLE HAVE LIVED HERE IN NORRIS GREEN.IT SHOWS THAT{75% OF THE {PEOPLE LIVING IN NORRIS GREEN HAVE {LIVED HERE FOR OVER 20 YEARS.}FOR OUR NEXT QUESTION WE ASKED WHERE THEY HAD MOVED FROM.WE GOT A LOT OF DIFFERENT ANSWERS.THE PEOPLE WHO HAVE LIVED HERE FROM 0-10 YEARS MOSTLY MOVED FROM TOWN BUT OTHERS MOVED FROM PLACES LIKE CROXTETH,FAZAKERLY AND COVENTRY.PEOPLE WHO HAVE LIVED FROM 10-19 YEARS IN NORRIS GREEN CAME FROM HUYTON,WALTON, KIRKBY AND MANCHESTER.THOSE WHO HAVE LIVED HERE FOR OVER 20 YEARS HAVE COME FROM ALL DIFFERENT TYPES OF PLACES.THE THIRD QUESTION WAS {WHY DID YOU MOVE?} HERE ARE SOME REASONS WHY PEOPLE MOVED FROM SOME OF THE PLACES:{BETTER HOUSES {BIGGER OR SMALLER HOUSE,NEIGHBOUR {PROBLEMS }BUT MOST SAID BECAUSE OF THE {REDEVELOPMENT OF THEIR HOUSES.
